project.description: Industrial warehouse expansion in Houston, Texas. Project ID: TX-IW-0515-EX. Expansion of existing 50,000 sq ft facility by adding 30,000 sq ft and upgrading loading docks. Existing facility must remain fully operational. CRITICAL timeline: Must complete in 4 months to meet peak season deadline. Target budget: $2.5M (flexible up to $2.8M if timeline accelerated). Priorities: Timeline is CRITICAL - every week of delay costs $50K. Speed and operational continuity are highest priorities. Cost is secondary.

bids.scope: Complete 30,000 sq ft warehouse addition with steel frame and metal siding, 6 new loading dock positions with dock levelers, expanded parking (50 spaces), utility connections, fire suppression extension, security integration. Phased construction plan to maintain continuous operations. 24/7 work capability if needed. Proven fast-track industrial experience.
Warehouse expansion and loading docks. Will work around existing operations. Aggressive schedule with extended hours.
Warehouse addition and dock improvements. Standard construction timeline.
